channel.title: Deltascape v16 client help
channel.description:
Hello all :) I need a alot of help with editing a client.
[s]1. I have changed the background of the client but when ever I try to edit the name of "deltascape.jpeg" when I open up the client it gives errors and won't load.[/s] [s]2. How can i make "M" apear behind the inventory.[/s] 3. When i run the client it loads to the screen that you have to enter your id/password and it says: username password server ip <- how can i remove this? port <- how can i remove this? [s]4. Change the name of the client ?[/s]
Will post more when i find problems

item.title: Deltascape v16 client help
item.dc:creator: @Stupit Stu
item.description:
@Stupit wrote:

Client.java Search for: Username:
Scroll Down and find port, and server ip delete thouse 2 lines of code.

item.title: Deltascape v16 client help
item.dc:creator: @Darkness_Pk Darkness Pk
item.description:
@Darkness_Pk wrote:

1. I have changed the background of the client but when ever I try to edit the name of "deltascape.jpeg" when I open up the client it gives errors and won't load.
In a class is searches for Deltascape.jpeg change it to yours.
2. How can i make "M" apear behind the inventory.
Edit your sprites
4. Change the name of the client ?
Frame_sub1

Read full topic

item.title: Deltascape v16 client help

item.description:
@junior631 wrote:

Hello all I need a alot of help with editing a client.

1. I have changed the background of the client but when ever I try to edit the name of “deltascape.jpeg” when I open up the client it gives errors and won’t load.
2. How can i make “M” apear behind the inventory.
3. When i run the client it loads to the screen that you have to enter your id/password and it says:
username
password
server ip <- how can i remove this?
port <- how can i remove this?
4. Change the name of the client ?

Will post more when i find problems
